entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
